channel.title: Help Running A Server
channel.description: I have a server that i can connect to when the ip is 127.0.0.1 but when I try to use my real IP, it cant connect! I have already forwarded the port and tryed opening the port with the Windows Firewall. If you could help me that would be great! I have a Siemens Gigaset router, AVG antivirus and PC Tools Firewall Plus

item.title: Help Running A Server
item.dc:creator: @TRiLeZ TRiLeZ
item.description:
@TRiLeZ wrote:

I have a server that i can connect to when the ip is 127.0.0.1 but when I try to use my real IP, it cant connect! I have already forwarded the port and tryed opening the port with the Windows Firewall.
If you could help me that would be great!
I have a Siemens Gigaset router, AVG antivirus and PC Tools Firewall Plus

Read full topic
